map.title: Level1
map.end:
You should travel to the planet Ossus, where Luke Skywalker is building his own Jedi temple and preparing to train a new group of Jedi.
The robot's concept of time span is not the same as humans, the ‘recent’ brew according to him has been 30 years old and he has been here for over 200 years. What he says about 'recent' is actually a long time ago, so you can't find Luke in Jabba's palace.
The bounty hunter is just bragging and trying to con you out of your money. He doesn't even know what the Jedi are capable of. The local bounty quests reflect the fact that the bounty hunters here are not very strong.
The Jawa doesn't understand you accurately through your gesture language. They thought the warrior with a brown cloak and a stick-like weapon was the Sand People there.
map.question: Where should you go to find the Jedi
answers: Jabba the Hutt's Palace (clue from the robot)
The valley to the north (clue from the Jawa)
Follow the Bounty Hunters (clue from the Bounty Hunter)
Go to Ossus (clue from the Mandalorian)

map_object.message:
Spaceship.
A Mandalorian spaceship. Some of the locals are carrying supplies upwards.

Wooden Barrel
Good wine, 30 years old.

Barkeeper Robot:
"You mean the Jedi?"
"Of course, I've seen them, they're legends of Tatooine, and Skywalker's hometown is in the town next door."
"They wiped out Jabba recently, no one extorts us anymore, thanks to Skywalker. "
"Oh, would you like to try the wine I made recently? It's fresh and good." Pointing to the barrel next to it.

Bounty Quest Bulletin Board
Help hunt a Banshee (Level: Difficult)
Repair a leaking roof (Level: Easy)
Find discarded steel to repair the outer fence (level: Medium)

Signboard
This bar has been in business for over 200 years

The Jawa:
You do not quite understand the language of the Jawas, and you struggle to communicate by gestures.
"You... looking for... warrior in a brown cloak?"
"...A long striped thing as a weapon?"
"...I have seen... days ago... camped in the valley... north"

Bounty Hunter:
"Jedi? Hahahaha how do you know I've caught a few Jedi?"
"That's how you catch them, just tie them up."
"Do you want to know where they are, just give me enough money and I can take you there."

The store outside
Some Gaddafi javelins are being sold here. People say the Sand People attacked this town a couple of days ago, and these are the weapons left behind after they were repulsed.

Fence
There are bloodstains and torn brown cloths on the fence, obviously signs of battle.

The Mandalorian:
"You want to learn how to be a Jedi too?"
The Mandalorian seemed to be caught up in the memory.
"Will you show me?"
You scramble to get the cup on the table to shake a little.
"Perhaps you could take your chances on the planet Ossus, the Force will guide you."

character.name: Young Kid
character.background: You are an orphan on the planet Tatooine who grew up listening to the legends of the Jedi rebelling against the evil empire. You thought your life would pass uneventfully, until one day you discovered that you could occasionally push things slightly through the air. Excited that you had the gift of mastering the Force, you wanted to be taught by a Jedi and set out to find one. The day you arrived in a bustling town, you will be looking for clues to the Jedi...
